Message: "Hey, doing a quick check-in with plumbers about how they’re handling material sourcing and supply. Could I speak with someone in charge of purchasing?
When would be a good time to get a hold of them?
“We are a wholesale supplier and move over 20M in inventory a year" "Are you satisfied with your current supplier setup?"

"you’re not alone. A lot of the plumbers we work with were running into delays, price hikes, or poor communication. That’s actually why we’ve been stepping in as a more reliable supplier"  “Out of curiosity, what kind of materials are giving you the most trouble right now?”
“If there were better prices and lead times out there, would that interest your business?”
“Well if your supplier ever runs short on stock or raises prices, this is my direct phone number and we'd love to be your fallback.”
"Are there any materials you need right now for inventory or an upcoming project?"
"No worries, Do you mind if i reach out in the 3-4 weeks to see if anything changed?
"No worries, Do you mind if i reach out in the 3-4 weeks to see if anything changed?
"Awesome, tell me what materials you need and I'll get the pricing"
Option 1 Text: Get contact info and work on pricing
